pkgmetadata.longdescription: Catalyst-Lab is an automation tool designed to streamline the process of building various Gentoo release stages and binhost packages. It manages the dependencies between stages, prepares the necessary files, and performs the builds.

flags.use: Enables support for building stages for different architecture using QEMU.
Enables support for uploading binpkgs and releases to git repository.
Enables support for binhost targets for build selected packages.
